DeleteProbeTask.title: 删除拨测任务

DescribeDetailedSingleProbeData.document: 列出单次拨测详情数据
DescribeDetailedSingleProbeData.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cat.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDetailedSingleProbeData
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BeginTime": 1679899994107,
    "EndTime": 1679903594107,
    "TaskType": "AnalyzeTaskType_Network",
    "SortField": "ProbeTime",
    "Ascending": true,
    "Offset": 0,
    "Limit": 10,
    "SelectedFields": [
        "ProbeTime",
        "City",
        "Operator",
        "ProbeIP"
    ],
    "TaskID": [
        "task-p4najqd4"
    ],
    "ScrollID": "xxx"
}
DescribeDetailedSingleProbeData.title: 列出单次拨测详情数据

DescribeNodes.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cat.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeNodes
<公共请求参数>

{
    "NodeType": 1
}
DescribeNodes.title: 获取拨测节点

DescribeProbeMetricData.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cat.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeProbeMetricData
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AnalyzeTaskType": "AnalyzeTaskType_Browse",
    "MetricType": "gauge",
    "Field": "avg(\"count\")",
    "GroupBy": "time(30d), \"operator\"",
    "Filters": [
        "\"host\" = 'default-host'",
        "time >= now()-3h"
    ]
}
DescribeProbeMetricData.title: 请求浏览数据

DescribeProbeNodes.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cat.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeProbeNodes
<公共请求参数>

{
    "NodeType": 0,
    "Location": 0,
    "IsIPv6": true,
    "NodeName": "广东",
    "PayMode": 0
}
DescribeProbeNodes.title: 查询拨测节点

{

}
UpdateProbeTaskAttributes.title: 更新探测任务属性

UpdateProbeTaskConfigurationList.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cat.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateProbeTaskConfigurationList
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TaskIds": [
        "task-xx"
    ],
    "Interval": 30,
    "Nodes": [
        "10001"
    ],
    "Parameters": "{}",
    "Cron": "* 0-6 * * *"
}
UpdateProbeTaskConfigurationList.title: 更新拨测任务配置
